name: DanceDouDoou
description:
Welcome To DanceDouDoou~
DanceDouDoou is a rhythm/beat Simulation Game, In this beautyful Summer Beach,Fellow Animals get together and Practice Dance Moves with Players~
[Features]
Players Can:
*Use Mouse Click and Drag to Move Animals Characters Head/Hands/Feets around and Record Their Movement.


*Put variety of Items onto Stage,then Animasl Characters can Punch/Smash/Kick/Interact with items and Make some funny Noise.


*Unlock Different kind of Interactable Items(total amount 500+) by Simply perform on Stage/Play rhythm mini Games.


Create your own Dance move and make some rhythm out of their Moves~
